Token.Abstract: Provides extensions to NSManagedObjectContext for various common tasks.
Inserts a new managed object for the entity for the given name.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A new, autoreleased, fully configured instance of the class for the entity named entityName. The instance has its entity description set and is inserted into the receiver.

Token.Abstract: Convenience method for performing a count of the number of instances of an entity with the given name.

Parameter.Name: predicate
Parameter.Abstract: A predicate to limit the search. May be nil.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: If there is a problem executing the fetch, upon return contains an instance of NSError that describes the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The number of objects a fetch request for the given entity name with the given predicate would have returned if it had been passed to executeFetchRequest:error:, or NSNotFound if an error occurs.

Token.Abstract: Fetches a single managed object for the given entity with the given value for the primary key attribute in the receiver.

Parameter.Name: entity
Parameter.Abstract: The entity of the managed object to be retrieved by primary key.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value for the entity's primary key attribute.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The managed object with the primary key attribute equal to the given value or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Fetches a single managed object for the entity for the given name with the given value for the primary key attribute in the receiver.

Parameter.Name: entityName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the entity of the managed object to be retrieved by primary key.

Parameter.Name: primaryKeyValue
Parameter.Abstract: The value for the receiving entity's primary key attribute.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The managed object with the primary key attribute equal to the given value or nil if none was found.

Token.Abstract: Saves the receiver and then traverses up the parent context chain until a parent managed object context with a nil parent is found. If the final ancestor context does not have a reference to the persistent store coordinator, then a warning is generated and the method returns NO.

Parameter.Name: error
Parameter.Abstract: If there is a problem saving the receiver or any of its ancestor contexts, upon return contains an pointer to an instance of NSError that describes the problem.

ReturnValue.Abstract: YES if the save to the persistent store was successful, else NO.
